info.author: Todd Salazar
info.description:
Features
        ========
        
        TODO
        
        Create an Email object and send
        ===============================
        
        .. code-block:: python
        
          from cheesefactory-Email import Email
        
          email = Email(
              recipients=['bob@example.com',],
              host='localhost',
              port='25',
              username='emailuser',
              password='emailpassword',
              sender='tom@example.com',
              subject='Fishing trip',
              body='Dear Bob,\nHow was the fishing trip?\n\nTom',
              use_tls=False,
              attachments=['file1.txt', 'file2.txt']
          )
        
Keywords: cheesefactory excel dataframe pandas development
Platform: UNKNOWN

info.name: cheesefactory-email
info.summary: An easier way to send Email
info.html_description:
Features
========

TODO

Create an Email object and send
===============================

.. code-block:: python

from cheesefactory-Email import Email

email = Email(
recipients=['bob@example.com',],
host='localhost',
port='25',
username='emailuser',
password='emailpassword',
sender='tom@example.com',
subject='Fishing trip',
body='Dear Bob,\nHow was the fishing trip?\n\nTom',
use_tls=False,
attachments=['file1.txt', 'file2.txt']
)

Keywords: cheesefactory excel dataframe pandas development
